channel.title: CVE Feed for StoreApps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StoreApps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34619|2024-08-04T00:19:47.369Z -- storeapps -- woocommerce%20stock%20manager
item.description: The WooCommerce Stock Manager WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery leading to Arbitrary File Upload in versions up to, and including, 2.5.7 due to missing nonce and file validation in the /woocommerce-stock-manager/trunk/admin/views/import-export.php file.

item.title: CVE-2023-5663|2024-03-13T15:27:11.281Z -- storeapps -- news%20announcement%20scroll
item.description: The News Announcement Scroll plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the plugin's shortcode in versions up to, and including, 9.0.0 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-5663|2024-08-02T08:07:32.463Z -- storeapps -- news%20announcement%20scroll
item.description: The News Announcement Scroll plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the plugin's shortcode in versions up to, and including, 9.0.0 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
